title: What are the documents required for admission into PES EC CAMPUS through KCET
content:
What are the documents required if I am joining PES ECC through KCET 3rd round, will attestation be required, and if so how many copies will be required. 
Thank you.

comments.body: They have a list of required documents on their website. U would need the originals and 2 sets of self-attested copies (signed by you) of them.
Should we get the notary from gazetted officers.
Should I just sign it and write "true copy" or is there anything more to it.
Nope. Ntg as such is needed
I didn't write anything tho. I took 1 set of originals, and 2 sets of photocopies. And signed on the photocopies and gave them.
Nope , my advice take 3 copies of all originals since they'll take only originals + 2 sets self attested copies and you can keep one set to yourself just incase you ever need them...
Should you submit your original school and PUC markseet?
